summary: This document appears to be a financial statement from Bank of America for the account associated with Leon D. Black, Debra Black, and Melanie Spinella. It details account activity for January 2011, including deposits, withdrawals, and the ending balance.

persons.name: Leon D. Black

persons.name: Debra Black

connections.description: Leon D. Black and Debra Black are listed as joint account holders.
Melanie Spinella is noted as having power of attorney for Leon D. Black.
Melanie Spinella is noted as having power of attorney for Debra Black.

keyFacts: The financial statement covers the period from January 1, 2011, to January 31, 2011.
The account had a beginning balance of $3,295,278.44 and an ending balance of $818,106.77.
Total deposits during the statement period were $20,724,721.06.
Total withdrawals during the statement period were $23,171,592.73.
Melanie Spinella is designated as power of attorney for both Leon D. Black and Debra Black.
